mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT user_id , user_name , user_birth , SUBSTR ( REGEXP_REPLACE(user_tel, '[^0-9]'), 4 ) userTel FROM olive_user ) WHERE userTel = #{userTel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO olive_user (user_id, user_name, user_pwd, user_tel, user_birth, user_email) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_name},#{user_pwd}, #{user_tel}, #{user_birth}, #{user_email} )
